text: the Lumina is the leading provider of
genomic tools at the center of our
products our sequencing systems which
pretty much power
most of the sequencing that's done in
the world today helix is a personal
genomics platform and what that means is
that we're really trying to lower the
barrier for really anyone out there who
wants to develop software that utilizes
genomic information you can kind of
think of helix as being you know a
little bit like an AWS for genomics we
have the hardware we've built software
layers on top of that and and you can
really just focus on building your
application helix uses Illumina software
to kick-start their lab operations they
use our limb system for the lab
management side of things as well as
basically sequence of for the automation
through sequencing and into data
analysis we selected Illumina
instruments and a lot of alumina
chemistry because you know they are the
market leader there and and that was
kind of the the only technology that
could get us to the scale we wanted to
sort of support the consumer market so
using base base in AWS has really
allowed us to scale to you know one of
the largest human exome sequencing
facilities and operations in the world
really quickly we've been able to work
really closely with helix and
collaborate at a much deeper level with
that comes a lot of feedback and helps
us improve our products one challenge
was their processing so many samples
through their lab and they needed a
holistic global view pretty granularly
of where everything was at and what
needed attention and so we were able to
build out more api's to support that and
then offer that for all our customers as
well partnering with AWS to provide the
most secure robust scalable platform
that we can our customers can really
focus on the science behind what they're
trying to accomplish rather than the
infrastructure of how do I get my data
process what do I do with it how do I
store it cost-effectively and that
really frees them up to focus on
advancing genomics as a field because
genomics is such a interdisciplinary
field we work very closely with Illumina
who
the world's experts in DNA sequencing as
well as with AWS that provides you know
the leading cloud infrastructure and and
sort of utilizing all of the great
products that they've already built
helix is then able to sort of layer on
top of that the aspects that are
specific to our personal genomics
platform
beyond sort of the relationship with
Illumina that's really been focused on
the lab and the operations there we also
built a bunch of platform services that
manage our relationship with our
partners and with our customers in the
marketplace and we've done that by
building these services on AWS utilizing
a number of AWS services including
redshift yes ec2 lambdas and ECS what's
really exciting about our relationship
with customers like helix is that it's
very symbiotic we're able to learn from
them just as we're also able to empower
them to do their work and this is a
really exciting time for genomics and
connecting all these customers and
helping to grow the community and the
the industry is very empowering
